documentation.description: Returns information about index shard recoveries, both on-going completed.

index.description: Comma-separated list or wildcard expression of index names to limit the returned information

format.description: a short version of the Accept header, e.g. json, yaml

active_only.description: If `true`, the response only includes ongoing shard recoveries

bytes.description: The unit in which to display byte values

detailed.description: If `true`, the response includes detailed information about shard recoveries

h.description: Comma-separated list of column names to display

index.description: Comma-separated list or wildcard expression of index names to limit the returned information

s.description: Comma-separated list of column names or column aliases to sort by

time.description: The unit in which to display time values
